Package fr.ecp.is1220.myvelib.part1

Class MyVelib

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.ecp.is1220.myvelib.part1.MyVelib
  • public class MyVelib
extends java.lang.Object
    MyVelib class. Main class of the myVelib system, with all main functions of the system : Rent, returnRent, printRents, printStations, printUsers, charge (a user for a ride), etc.
    Author:
    Kellysto

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

    • Constructor Detail

      • MyVelib

        public MyVelib​(java.lang.String name,
               int N,
               int M)
        Constructs a new MyVelib object, with 30% of Plus stations (70% standard), 70% of parking slots Occupied, 30% of bicycles being electric, etc.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the network.
        N - The number of stations.
        M - The total number of parking slots.

      • MyVelib

        public MyVelib​(java.lang.String name,
               int N,
               int M,
               double squareSize,
               int nbikes)
        Constructs a new MyVelib object.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the network.
        N - The number of stations.
        M - The total number of parking slots.
        squareSize - The size of the square containing the stations (in km).
        nbikes - The total number of bikes. À FINIR
